name: Airplane
description:
Fly An Airplane!

WASD for pitch an' yaw, Q an E for roll

Spacebar is throttle, R toggles reverse

LeftShift hold for fine controls, B is brakes (Hold B and Space to make sharp turns on the ground)

Camera controls: IJKL with U an' O for zoomin'.

Tab to reset, V cycles through 3 quality levels, T toggles autopilot functions

Hold throttle to build up speed. Once the plane pitches forward a bit, hold S to take off! See if you can land with less than 3 m/s descent speed.

(Airplane v0.20, sound design by JLB)
